sentence.Network_cn: 然而铍的毒性限制了它的作用.

sentence.Network_en: Toxicity problem in manufacturing and storage might be alleviated by coating beryllium with aluminum.
sentence.Network_cn: 但如果用铝包覆铍,则可避免加工过程中及储存期间的中毒问题.
